No.68289) Sub.: Clarification regarding   applicability of Atmanirbhar Bharat relief upto 30.06.2021 for Contractors/ Developers of Road Sector for Schedule-G in HAM projects. Ref. : MoRTH letter no: COVID-19/Roadmap/ JS (H)/2020 dated 31.12.2020. (ii) NHAI letter no_ NHAI/KNT /Extension/2021(E-68289) dated 15.03.2021 _ (iii) MoRTH letter no. COVID-19/Roadmap/ JS (H)/2020-Part (2) dated 26.03.2021_ The applicability of MoRTH letter dated 31.12.2020 cited at Ref.(i) (copy at Annex-1) for Schedule-G of HAM projects was taken Up with MoRTH vide NHAI letter dated 15.03.2021 cited at Ref.(ii) (copy at Annex-2). In reply, MoRTH vide letter dated 26.03.2021 cited at Ref. (iii) (copy at Annex-3) has clarified that the relaxation of Schedule-H in EPC Contracts granted upto 30.06.2021 by the Ministry vide letter dated 31.12.2020 is applicable for Schedule-G in HAM contracts as well. This is for information of all concerned. 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encls: As above (Sheo Shankar Jha) CGM (Coord.)
